data.title: Colmar Jewish & Kosher Guide 2024: Kosher Info in Colmar, France
data.meta_description: Colmar Kosher & Jewish Guide, Vacations & Trips: the biggest web guide for Kosher Restaurants & Eateries, Hotels, Vacation Rentals, Synagogues, Mikvahs, Minyans / Shuls, Shabbat Meals, Rooms & Hospitality, Chabad - for the Jewish Observant Traveler in Colmar France
data.text:
What Is *JOFY?

JOFY, or "Jewish Observant Friendly" Establishments are lodging establishments offering special services for Jewish Observant guests such as Shabbat meals, accommodation on lower floors and regular keys for the rooms. It can also be a NON KOSHER establishment located in walking distance from the local Shul, community or kosher restaurants area.

Please note - *JOFY does NOT mean that KOSHER food is served on the premises!
